reviews.title: Nice hostel, but pricy for the room you get

reviews.text: We booked a hostel in Grindelwald to try and save money on our big trip. What a wonderful, pleasant surprise! I expected creepy and noisy and what we got was clean, helpful and a delightful experience! The front desk help was exactly that, HELPFUL! Madelyn answered questions, gave us suggestions, did our laundry -- they even had stamps for postcards. The breakfast was very nice and the lady who ran the kitchen was very efficient and ran the cleanest kitchen I've seen in a long time! The coffee was great, they even had local alpenkäse. I would go back there in a heartbeat! The views are fantastic -- you can't believe it. And the location for getting to the Jungfrau via the Männlichenbahn can't be beat (just walk through the parking lot to the ticket booth).
reviews.title: Hostel life--pleasantly & surprisingly wonderful!

reviews.text: I had a great time in Grindelwald; fantastic hiking and the Mountain Hostel was terrific. Rooms were clean and equipped with lockers. Good shared showers and bathroom facilities. Outdoor kitchen was great: hot plate, sink, fridge, and all kinds of plates/cups/pots/pans/utensils makes it easy to buy food at the Coop in town and cook with the other guests -- a nice way to meet people. The hostel's right on the river with a superb view of the Eiger Nordwand.
reviews.title: GREAT place to stay!

reviews.text: Breakfast at the Mountain Hostel is well worth it. You get all kinds of bread, cheese, cereal, fruit, juice, coffee, etc. There is an internet computer but it's a bit on the expensive side and you can't upload pictures. If you don't like walking up and down hills you should make sure to get off at the GRUND train station (but hey, this is hilly hiking country, walking is good exercise).

reviews.text: The real selling point here is the staff. I had an unfortunate mishap where I lost a significant personal item on an extended venture away from the hostel, and the owner himself went well above and beyond the call of duty helping me get it back. Everyone in the reception area was super helpful and I had no trouble here despite my two-word German vocabulary.
